#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

ll dp[100010];

void pre()
{
    dp[0]=dp[1]=dp[2]=dp[3]=0;
    ll i;
    for(i=4;i<100004;i++)
    {
        dp[i]=dp[i-1]+(i/2)-1;
    }

}
int main()
{
    ll i,j,k,n,m,t,p;
    pre();
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;

        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            ll a,b;
            cin>>a>>b;
        }

        ll ans=dp[n] + (n-1) - m;

        cout<<ans<<"\n";


    }
    return 0;
}
